title: Bloom Filter
filter_size_label: Number of bits in the filter (max 500):

messages.title_welcome: # Welcome to the Bloom Filter Visualization Tool!
messages.learn_bloom_filters: You can learn Bloom Filters step by step
messages.instruction_resize_add_dummy: Resize and add dummy items to the filter if you want
messages.instruction_add_check: Use the 'Add' and 'Check' to learn how it works
messages.instruction_disable_step_by_step: Disable step by step execution if you want
messages.title_adding_item: # Adding an item to the Bloom Filter
messages.calculate_hashes: To add the item "|item|", we will first calculate its hashes
messages.set_first_bit_position: We need to set the bit at position |hash| to true in the bit array
messages.setBit_position: Now, we set the bit at position |hash| to true in the bit array as well.
messages.set_final_bit_position: And we finnaly set the bit at position |hash| to true in the bit array.
messages.item_added: All done! The item "|item|" has been added to the Bloom Filter
messages.item_present: The item "|item|" is already in the Bloom Filter. Adding it again won't change the filter
messages.title_checking_item: # Checking membership of an item in the Bloom Filter
messages.instruction_step_by_step: We will go through the process step by step. You can click 'Next Step' to proceed or 'Finish Execution' to complete the process immediately.
messages.check_item_hashes: To check if the item "|item|" is in the Bloom Filter, we will calculate its hashes
messages.check_each_position: Let's check the bit at each position
messages.all_bits_set: All the bits at positions are set to true!
messages.item_possibly_present: The item "|item|" is possibly in the Bloom Filter
messages.item_definitely_present: And in fact, the item "|item|" is present in the Bloom Filter (no false positive here!)
messages.item_not_present: The item "|item|" is definitely not in the Bloom Filter
